name: Hoodline, Inc.
description: Provider of a local news and content discovery platform created to discover local content online. The company's platform uses machine learning to distribute geo-tagged and relevant content from hundreds of media partners into websites or mobile applications, enabling users to search and access aggregated content on their mobile phones.
